title: Ninurta config
description: A config file describing Ninurta sites

ports.description: The ports to use for inbound connections

http.description: The port to use for unencrypted traffic

https.description: The port to use for encrypted traffic

site.description: The config for a particular site

path.description: The relative path to the directory containing the files to be served

domain.description: The main domain for the site

redirects.description: A set of domains to redirect back to the main domain
